string.name: c_inc
string.string: \u2022 Exclusive 2-step process targets both grow cockroaches & eggs that hatch in 15 days

string.name: c_proc
string.string: \u2022 Spraying to be done in all parts of house in 1st visit (Kitchen need to be emptied by customer)\n
\u2022 Gel application done in 2 visit to target eggs of cockroaches (generally hatch in 2+ weeks)

string.name: c_saf
string.string: \u2022 Do not touch surfaces until dry\n
\u2022 Do not wipe or spray any other chemical on the gel

resources.string: \u2022 Only government approved safe & odourless chemicals by Bayer to used (in recommended dosage only)
